circumstances:
The crew departed RAF Leuchars for a local training mission. In flight, the airplane collided with a second RAF Fairey IIID registered N9754. While this second aircraft was able to land and its crew was uninjured, the N9756 entered a dive and crashed in Guardbridge, southwest of the airbase. Both crew members were killed. 
Crew:
F/O Harry Lestourgeon Roseveare,
Cpl Tom Vincent Warwick.
